text: Senang sekali bisa menginap di Mamaka, first new urban resort yang terletak di Kuta. Staycation disini pilihan yang tepat dan sangat recommended bagi siapa pun baik couple, single traveler, maupun family dan yang lebih menariknya lagi kita bisa mengajak hewan peliharaan kita juga, karena tersedia fasilitasnya. Lokasi hotel sangat strategis, persis didepan pantai kuta dan dekat dengan shopping mall dan berbagai restaurant di sekitar area, cukup hanya berjalan kaki saja. Pelayanannya sangat baik dan ramah, juga selalu menerapkan protokol covid 19. Kamar hotel sangat bersih dan nyaman serta memiliki design yang berbeda. Restaurant dengan makanan yang lezat, menyajikan 50%vegetarian food dan Asian modern. Mamaka hotel pun sangat instagramable, dgn design dinding unik pada area lobby, terdapat juga fasilitas clothes shop corner, self laundry service, salon/barbershop dan rooftop pool yang akan segera dibuka. Secara keseluruhan amat sangat memuaskan, can’t wait to be back 😁
title: Funky & cool hotel in kuta.... for a family with 2 infants & a pet

text: Beautiful hotel with a boutique vibe and very professional staff. Rooms are very cute with comfortable beds and nice shampoo. We loved the contactless app concept and the breakfast options. text: We stayed at Mamaka by Ovolo during our stay in Bali, Indonesia.  The hotel’s located was perfectly situated right across from Beautiful Kuta Beach. text:

text: The location of the hotel is perfect. The hotel is right on Kuta beach, which is a good place to surf (beginners and intermediate). In addition, the nightlife or shopping center in Kuta is only a few minutes' walk away. Despite the location on the street, the hotel is very quiet. The hotel also offers a pool on the rooftop with spectacular views of the sea. The rooms are spacious and the beds are very comfortable. In addition, the hotel's friendly staff leave nothing to be desired and are extremely helpful. I had a lovely stay and can highly recommend the hotel.
title: Best location in Kuta

text: Loved the vibe, the hospitality and the overal happiness. The location is great, right at the beach but not too crowded. They have an amazing rooftop pool. The kitchen is great. Healthy and tastefull food and drinks.  The rooms are modern, Light, clean and the bed is cozy.  The staff is young and funky and very welcoming.  Next time im in Bali, i will return!
title: Funky & modern

text:
We arrived at Mamaka by ovolo to spend our last 3 nights of our 2 week holiday in Bali.  After reading all the fabulous reviews we decided here was the place for us ….we were not disappointed, all the reviews have been very accurate.

The pool area is great and they play subtle music so it gives it some atmosphere during the day.

The roof top bar/restaurant serves great food and even better daiquiris! We had many of them! 

Breakfast every morning was delicious, and a great selection of choice, we would recommend the eggs Benedict.

The Hotel smells fresh all day and all the staff are lovely and willing to help wherever they can. The hotel rooms are modern and clean. The only downside could be the walls do seem quite thin so if you have noisy neighbours it might affect you, other than that the hotel is within walking distance to plenty of restaurants and the beach is a stones throw away.
title: Fabulous last few days to our holiday

text:
The place to called home when in Bali. My first time was during the pandemic in August 2021 and stayed for about 3 weeks. And ever that since become my favorite place to be when in Bali. I have stayed for holidays, business, and other random occasions yet they always give the best services to accomodate my needs. Room was clean, Bed is my favorite. The view KOKOMO room of Kuta Beach line is breathaking. Location wise is very strategic, there is a few small "gang" nearby as shortcut - also just 3 minutes away from BeachWalk Mall. 
No words can discribe the POOL and Sunset Deck view. AMAZING!!! Many activities provided for in-house guest and we can easily choose to enjoy. Food is fushion and okay. Overall, I would love to comeback for more. Can't wait to try the other branch overseas too :) Thank you, Mamaka!
title: "HOME" to be when in Bali

text:
Hands down, the best experience I have ever had with a Hotel. The rooms were beautiful. And all the small touches go a long way. The staff went above and beyond to accommodate in every way. My driver and guide Ary Shelby was absolutely incredible! He went above and beyond to create an absolutely beautiful experience. He left no details undone. My friend and I were able to see and do everything together and also take in some excursions solo. And Ary made sure that we were completely safe while having the time of our life. The staff was exceptional and refreshing, in this day and age. Their kindness, smiles and warmth were outstanding. The food and drinks were top-notch. It was completely relaxing, I found myself eating and drinking mostly at the hotel. Egard the Manager was a joy, and it was easy to see why the staff was so incredible. 
I will definitely be returning with my family. 
I truly cannot emphasize enough how wonderful this place is. 
It was hard to leave, these people became my friends. Which is what made this trip so wonderful for me. I am truly grateful for each of them. They all deserve a raise. I travel quite a bit around the world. And my experience at Mamaka has by far exceeded my greatest expectations. Thank you all, I’ll be seeing you soon!!
title: The time of my life!

text:
The best Hotel in Kuta! Room with ocean view. Premium expedient 10 stars!!! I would love to come back. Staffs are so kind and helpful!!  
Im in love with the hotel and service.  They have an amzing pool, service at the pool too. Restaurant and best service.

text: My stay at Mamaka has been amazing. The hotel has everything pool, gym , good restaurant and also close to the beach and a shopping mall. The staff has also been very helpful and friendly. Good breakfast!
title: Solo traveled

text:
What an amazing hotel. Right opposite the beach and near the action. This is by far the best experience in a hotel for me. I was supposed to stay 10 days, I stayed almost a month. 

The staff were just incredible making you feel welcome and sooo helpful. The Roof Top what a magnificent piece with a sunset view out of this world. The infinity pool is just fantastic and day beds are just so comfy. The Roof Top food is very good too (Breakfast and Dinner). Rooms are beautifully designed and very clean clean. I stayed in the Top Gun and Swagger suite don't look further these are the best rooms to stay. The facilities (lifts, gym, free laundry) are in great conditions too.

Overall, I cannot thank the Mamaka team enough. I was so sad to leave. They made me and my son welcome. I will definitely be back. It was my first time back to Bali in 36 years. Kuta changed for sure but I am so glad I picked this AMAZING hotel.

P.s: internet is great too I worked video calls not a problem even laying by the pool :)
title: Superb stay at the Mamaka in Kuta

photos.caption: Sunset from the Roof Top just WOW
That bath is just so inviting after a long day :)

text: Poor choice in breakfast a la carte, portions way to small. If you want more food, you have to pay extra. Loud music everywhere, starting at 06:30 in the morning!!! until 23:00. So the music wakes you up at 06:30, and you can go to sleep when it stops at 23:00. Also karaoke in the hotel next doors, very loud and terrible singing. There are much better hotels available, for less money.

text:

Love this place so much. Close to the market, shopping center, very hospitality staff, clean rooms, tasty breakfast 🤪 we came with friends of 6 people and EVERYONE like it, especially roof top with DJI and sea view 😍 so highly recommended ❤️
Thank you for food vacation with bestie ❤️

text: We staid here for 2 days with my girlfriend. Best service, kitchen and rooms, which I visited on Bali with this price. Good place and amazing views on last floor. Near much markets and restaurants. I will visit this hotel again! Really! Thank you!
title: Amazing Rooms, Kitchen and view.

text:
When making a reservation online for accommodation, we always certain to have  a high expectation that it would be as good as the pictures. 
And Mamaka by Ovolo at Kuta was a perfect example of that. From the premium location, modern outlook, the welcoming reception on the front desk, spacious 24 gym, self service laundry, to a contemporary funky retro design of the room. However, watching 180 degrees view of the Kuta sunset from the Rooftop bar, 'Kuta Social Club' or having breakfast the next morning at 'Street 32' or simply enjoying the sun by Infinity Pool side while sipping the amazing looking Frozen Strawberry Margarita were the ultimate Highlights of my experience. Best service from all staff members for anything you need. Remarkable memories that I can't wait to go back to.
title: MAMAKA by Ovolo : 11 out of 10 Experience of Heaven in Paradise

photos.caption: Impressive view from Infinity Pool at Mamaka by Ov

text: Genuine, caring, competent staff. Clean facility, great air conditioning, handy free laundry room, excellent gym. Cool vibe at downstairs restaurant and rooftop pool and Kuta Social Club. Located directly across street from Kuta Beach with awesome view of waves and surfers from rooftop and if you are lucky from your room. Mamaka provides comfortable refuge from the Bali heat, traffic and vehicle air pollution. Short walk to nice shopping mall with excellent, affordable food courts and safe ATMs.
title: Relaxing Oasis to Escape Bali Heat and Traffic

text: Housekeeping is awesome at this hotel. They are a group of friendly young people who were willing to do anything for me - I'm sure the other guests too. I've stayed here twice this past month on the second and fifth floors. I thought the housekeeping teams on both floors did a great job. Anytime I returned to either room, I found them spotless. I was also always greeted with wholehearted, unfeigned smiles coming and going. The common areas as well. I always saw someone keeping everything clean. By the way about the smiles, this goes for the rest of the staff like security, front desk, and the restaurant as well. Good people work here. And yes, the hotel is "aging." Isn't everything and everyone in the world "aging." It is maintained quite well and still looks new to me. I really like this hotel as you can tell. I did something I normally never do (lately): I came back here for a second time. It's not that I don't like other hotels at other locations and don't want to return; I just want different experiences so I try other hotels when I return to a location. This place was so awesome the first time, that I didn't even bother checking on anywhere else when I was returning here. You know, I could talk about the room furnishings and the pool and the breakfast and the vibe and all that, but what is most extraordinary about this place is the staff. You know, I think they must have an exceptional on-site manager because all the staff seem genuinely happy whenever I see them. Even when they are talking amongst themselves without any guests nearby, I see them smiling and just generally happy being with each other. What I'm talking about is something important to me. How is something like this possible anyway? I remember when I was a working man, I wasn't happy like they are here. I just wanted to do my job and go home. I don't think I smiled very much, and I had a customer base like they do. I think they actually enjoy taking care of their guests here. I believe their engaging spirit flows down from their leadership is answer to how it is possible. If the boss ain't happy, the workers aren't either. I commend the on-site manager for his leadership and instilling well-being and content in the staff, and by the way me as well.

text: From the moment my Family was picked up from the airport by Mamaka staff we were treated like VIP’s all throughout our stay. The Top Gun Suite was complete comfort for my wife and 2 kids (6 and4). The hotel offers activities to keep the kids thoroughly entertained especially with the rooftop infinity pool overlooking the beach at the Kuta Social Club which also has a restaurant where you can eat and drink and watch the best sunset in Bali. The food on offer was delicious with both western and local cuisine on offer. This was my 3rd stay and have stayed in the Queen High and Kokomo rooms which all have a fun themed feel about them and are extremely comfortable. With the quality of wifi it has been the perfect place to mix work and pleasure. The staff were exceedingly helpful with any requests and knowledgeable with setting up tours and giving advice about things to do. Whether for work or pleasure I wouldn’t stay anywhere else in Bali

text:
Great little find just across from Kuta beach where there's a skateboard park, surfing etc. The staff are lovely very attentive, always address you by your name asking how you are, where are you, where have you been from the front desk, in the restaurant and even the room cleaners. The room was compact, comfortable, nice ornaments, water pressure in the shower was wonderful too.

Great roof top pool and bar area which is suitable for sunset drinks with a great view of the coastline with a pleasant breeze.

Breakfast you're able to order of the a la carte menu with a good variety, wonderful coffee, fruit platter and bottled water.

text:
My wife and I stayed at Mamaka for 6 nights. I cannot believe how fortunate we were to find this hotel. The original hotel that we had booked turned out to be a real let down (Mercure Kuta Bali), so we checked out and got a full refund. We then had to find somewhere very quickly. We found a great deal on the Swagger Suite at Mamaka, so booked it. It was a little more expensive than the previous hotel, but wow! What a difference. 

As we entered the lobby area of Mamaka, we immediately felt much better after the trauma of the previous place. It looked clean, modern, new, fresh and inviting. The staff were very pleasant, helpful and welcoming, and greeted us with genuine smiles. This wasn’t only on our arrival, but also every time we saw them. 

We went to our suite, and as soon as we entered the room, we knew we had made the right choice. Quite often we see photos of hotel rooms on websites, then are disappointed when we see the real room. In this case, we found the actual room to be even better than it looked in the photos, and they already look great. The suite was well equipped with a large and comfortable bed, large windows with an ocean view, electric blinds, a small kitchen area with so many quirky additions. All the appliances were clean and new, and very well presented. The decor was modern and fresh, with a large screen smart TV and good Wi-Fi. 

Shortly after arrival, our bags were brought to the room, and the guy asked us if we would like a welcome cocktail. Of course, we said yes. He went away to fetch them, but when he returned, it wasn’t just with two drinks. He brought the whole cocktail trolley and mixed them in our room. Very fresh, tasty and refreshing. Nice touch!

After a good nights sleep we went to the rooftop restaurant for breakfast. Again the staff were great, the view was fantastic and the ambiance was relaxing. I have to say that the breakfast is one of the best we have had from any hotel, and I have stayed in hundreds of hotels in over 70 countries. It was only after a few days that I found out that the rooftop breakfast is only for guests who book a suite, so I can’t comment on the regular breakfast. In my opinion, it was worth booking a suite, just for the breakfast experience! Freshly prepared and a huge variety of healthy, tasty and good quality dishes. As I write this, my mouth is watering as I remember the experience. It really was that good. 

The location is great. Just across the road from Kuta Beach, only 5 minutes walk from the Beachwalk Mall, and a similar distance to many bars and restaurants. I very rarely take the time to write reviews, but I have already left a review on Mamaka’s website, and on Agoda because this hotel is just so good. After my review on the website, I was contacted by the general manager, Joel Bartlett, to thank me for the review. It is clear to me that he and all the staff at Mamaka pay attention to detail and focus on making the experience for guests as best as possible, and I thank them all for a fantastic stay. We will be back next year, and hope we can stay in the same room. 

I have only one point for improvement. The elevator area on the landing has music playing, and as much as I love music, the volume needs to be lowered, as we could sometimes hear it in our room. I appreciate you are trying to create a vibe in that area, but keep the sound in that area. 

Thanks again Mamaka. Awesome!
title: Outstanding

text:
The Mamaka Hotel is a good combination of stylish and cozy hotel and it’s location is directly at the Kuta beach which is one of the famous surf spots in the world.
The hotels location is also very good for having day trips to Cangu, Uluwatu and Ubud which are some of the famous places for sightseeing.
From the Infinity pool of the hotel you can have a nice view to Kuta beach and the statue of the GWK in Uluwatu. 
From the “Kuta social club” which is the rooftop bar of the hotel you can have a beautiful sunset view with good cocktails and food for dinner.
I’m frequently traveling to Bali since more than 10 years for weekend and holiday trips (2x a year) and with the Mamaka Hotel i found a nice part time home for my trips.
In this hotel everything is fine for a good holiday trip to Bali. The rooms are cozy and stylish, the location is very good and the breakfast in this hotel is fresh and delicious.
The staff is friendly and ambitionated.
Great place to stay!
Thank you!

text:
We chose Mamaka as a perfect combination of experiences. It is well positioned for the long ocean walks, shopping and selection of restaurants around.

Mamaka is a contemporary lively hotel for travellers who value comfort. I personally liked the swimming pool on a rooftop, together with the bar it was a perfect sanctuary for us for lazy mornings.

Another helpful amenity is a self-laundry facilities of the ground floor. With the general humidity it is a perfect solution (instead of the usually pricey hotel laundry service) to have a relaxed trip.

Mamaka focuses on details that made our stay comfortable: shower rooms, place to store surfboards overnight, and surely the gym.

The restaurant and the bar serve both local and European food and beverages; The rooftop bar offers the selection of delicious signature cocktails.

Separately I wanted to mention the app of the hotel. Finally, no need to call and talk to anybody, just go into the app and have your dine-in or any other experiences booked.

The staff is incredibly friendly, and we’re endlessly grateful for our memorable stay.
title: Perfect stay in Kuta, Bali for two

text:
This was my 2nd  time staying at Mamaka hotel in Kuta.  As a solo traveler in a tropical destination; Mamaka exceeds my expectiations. Two completely different restaurants with delicious food and artful display, rooftop pool with ocean views, a wonderful gym facility, laundry, free yoga & muy Thai classes throughout the week, and they have a Quicksilver surf camp!! 

It can be hard sometimes traveling alone, but this is the part of the hotel that stands out above all.  The hotel staff  are amazing.  Every single person there is very friendly, helpful, and make you feel right at home.  Working in hospitality myself for 14 years; I can see how well the staff is trained, and genuinely care about their clients staying with them. Special thanks to Amanda & the GM Joel for their kindness and assistance in everything I've reached out for. .  

If you have a question or concern for any reason- one of the staff members will set your mind at ease quickly.  I wish I could give a shout out to every person working at the hotel, and say thank you for everything!! I've stayed all over Bali in many different types of stays, but their hotel motto "good vibrations" is exactly how I'd describe the whole ambiance!  

Also, the hotel has great WiFi- which isn't always the easiest to find in Bali; but i was easily able to have video conference calls with no delay or wifi cutting out. Their rooms are modern with a beachy surfer vibe, nice comfortable beds & spacey living space.  Not to mention- multiple outlights (& USB!) For charging all your electronics (you're usually lucky if get 2 outlets in a room in Bali.)... And one of my favorite aspects for the rooms: drawn down black out shade for a good night's rest. 

The location is perfectly nestled up across from Kuta Beach, and one can easily go to Legion, or Seminyak for the day or a night on the town to mix up your stay.
title: Above and beyond

text:
All in all, mamaka by ovolo is a very enjoyable hotel. The most important thing is its per friendly. The goodie bag for my dog was really awesome. 
The room is very spacious, quite well equipped amenities, no shaving kit or sewing kit, though.
The hotel is situated on the busy main rood, which is both good and bad, good because its in close proximity to kuta beach and kuta beachwalk, its bad because when you drive a car there, you'll be stuck in a traffic jam. Its better to come and go to the hotel at a non busy hours.
The hotel facility is really awesome, with quite well-equipped gym, free laundry room, and a Rooftop swimming pool.
I would love to stay there again, especially for their pet friendly policy. Would be much better if they offer a pet hotel service because some of the tourism spots in Bali is not pet friendly and we can't bring our dogs.
 
There are a couple things happened during breakfast. first of all,  me and my brother has to take separate time going for our breakfast because during check in, we were told that our dog should not bark, they did say we can bring him down to breakfast, but there is a big chance he will bark there. Our next solution is to let our fury friend stay inside the room while we went down for breakfast, but again, since he IS a dog, he WILL bark. Furthermore, during check-in the staff in front informed us to not leave our pooch unattended even in the room. So we have no choice but to take separate breakfast. 
I mean for a hotel who claimed to be pet friendly, they didn't take into account that sometimes pets do make sound.

Secondly, when my brother went for his breakfast (he went down first), he came back saying that the portion was really little. I can understand that amount of food is subjective, but, he also complained he only got one drink, just one fruit juice that isn't even a real fruit. While when I went down, I got both juice and coffee. Probably miscommunication happened when he went for his breakfast.

Thirdly, when I came down for breakfast, the service was good, i did get both juice and coffee, and in my opinion, the amount of food is enough (again, this is subjective). But when the waiter serve my food, one of the cherry tomatoes fell down. if the waiter apologized, all would be fine, but he pretend to not see it. I do not know if the service are different for local tourist and international, and since I'm local, I got worse service. And since I'm actually a bit in a rush, I didnt say anything, but I remember I'll tell about it during the review.
title: Our very first pet friendly hotel experience

text: The movie ‘Eat, Pray, Love’ truly put Bali on the map for many people around the world. You can feel the spirituality almost everywhere you go. It’s stunningly beautiful throughout. From the US it's a 22 hour flight, but you can rest your weary jag-lagged head as soon as you arrive at Mamaka and know that there isn’t a lack of delicious food right at the hotel at Kuta Social Club and Street 32 as well as everything else you could want or need from a resort. The rooms are modern, clean, and decorated tastefully. Every single member of the staff made you feel welcome and like you're at home. The gym was great, FREE self service laundry services, FREE breakfast to start your day right that is delicious, the best view of Kuta on the rooftop with a great pool, great extremely affordable massages in their spa, and their soundtrack of music around every nook, cranny, and turn make you sway your head and feel the #GoodVibrations during every second of your stay here.

text:
The Mamaka by Ovolo which is listed on some websites as newly built which is not the case; The hotel was previously Citadines Kuta built over 11 years ago and was then purchased and opened in 2020 by Ovolo. 

The hotel is conveniently located across the road from Kuta Beach and short walk from restaurants and a shopping mall.

Inside the rooms they have added some new wallpaper and changed the colour scheme.

The rooms are a reasonable sized but the beds for me were to hard and uncomfortable. I did exoress my concerns and the manager Joel was very professional and advised me they are updating and replacing mattresses and he organised a comfort topper for my bed which made it more comfortable. Joel was very dedicated and professional. When all the mattresses are replaced it will be much more comfortable

There is a small LCD TV on the wall for the reasonably good selection of English speaking channels, but why, when a company has bought the hotel, why didn't they upgrade these to modern larger LCD SMART TVs I.thought this was.aityle odd.

The rooms could have better soundproofing and if you get a room that is anywhere near the elevators you'll hear music pumping through internal speakers in the corridors which also emanates into the rooms. So if you're a light sleeper I recommend you ask for a room away from the elevators.

The bathrooms are fairly small. The shower is a reasonable sized but only has average water pressure.

They provide tea and coffee making facilities, a safe, a bar fridge, and free bottled water.

The rooftop Restaurant and Bar offer great views across Kuta Beach and the bay, as does the rooftop swimming pool. The rooftop area is popular at sunset.to watch The sunset over the ocean shin while having a drink.

When all the mattresses are upgraded / replaced, this hotel will be more comfy, but the rooftop bar and views over the beach will always be a winner for this hotel
title: Modern Hotel across the road from the beach

text:
I had the best time staying at Mamaka on Kuta Beach during my recent hols in Bali!

The hotel is just across from Kuta Beach and within walking distance to Beachwalk Mall, (not too near, not too far either) which was pretty convenient for me and my kids. The only downside though are the roadworks in front of the hotel which could get pretty messy especially on a rainy day and that the area isn’t  too well lit at night, which I think they are in the midst of improving.

The rooftop pool has an amazing view of the surroundings but it’s pretty basic and doesn’t offer much for kids. The rooms however, were really nice and they have the comfiest beds, something which I definitely look forward to coming back after a whole day of sightseeing around Bali!  

The breakfast is ala-carte, with a choice of one mains, one coffee / tea, and juice. Might not seem much if you are used to buffet type breakfast but you’ll be surprised at how delicious the food was and it’s quite filling too! Don’t worry about the options for mains as they were pretty good and not too limited. 

I really enjoyed my stay at Mamaka. They have the best staff too as everyone was really helpful and efficient! Everything is done through the apps, from amenities to room service and the respond was really quick, which was impressive! 

Mamaka definitely is not a shabby hotel. If anything, I’d say that it’s one of the best in Bali and definitely one worth staying at!
title: ONE OF THE BEST STAYS IN BALI

text: Lovely rooms. The view on the south side of the building is not built out. We stayed on the 5floor. We could see the ocean and could lie in bed watching the planes coming in and out of Bali, surfers and people on the beach. The location is excellent. Got to see the Swagger Suite. Request the 5th floor so you have uninterrupted views of the ocean that is across the road. The coffee is excellent. The food was ok but not awesome. There were a few things that need attending. The staff are not like your normal beautiful Balinese. The restaurant down stairs for breakfast had great staff but upstairs the were not. I found the lady (maybe German) that was working was not helpful or nice at all. Quiet rude . The breakfast was super disappointing with no buffet. Had to order of the menu and you are only allowed one thing. “Real” coffee was included. Any changes seemed to be a drama and always having to check if they were allowed to do it. One huge complaint is the music upstairs. It is unbearably way too loud. You can’t even sit there and have a meal without it blaring. After Melbourne Cup it was so lid that it was distorted. We went up for a swim where there is speaker all along the pool and we hopped out straight away as we couldn’t handle the loudness. There was only a few people up there & they were complaint about the volume but the staff did nothing. The music is also very loud for the rooms below. It was rather ridiculous. The hotel seems to have a lot of Aussies and Europeans staying but yet they don’t have proper bacon. That was terrible. This hotel allows dogs so that was great to see families holiday ing with their pups. They get a good bag when they arrive. When you go to your room there is a lively hand written note with a little bag of goodies to eat which was lovely. The room cleaners are good. There was one particular guy that was digging for tips and that was a bit uncomfortable. I left a tip for one of the staff but they didn’t do the room the next day and the others took her tip even though him/her name was in it. Overall it is lovely but they need to fix the volume and the staff attitude.

text:
After a long haul flight from London and only a 25 minute drive from Ngurah Rai airport our arrival at Mamaka on Kuta beach was a welcome sight at 1am in the morning. Straight into the open lobby and greeted by the smiles of the welcoming front desk team, check in was smooth and bags transported in no time.

We stayed in the Top Gun suite and it was everything I dreamed of and more. With two ensuite bedrooms, one king sized with a bath for the queen and the other with two single beds, a separate kitchen area with bar and coffee amenities and a dining room with L shaped sofa, this was the perfect place to lounge on arrival. The suite was decorated with balloons on the bed for the kids and a plate of sweet treats with a hand drawn welcome card which was a heartfelt touch. Once the kids were in bed, some alone time on the balcony, cocktail in hand stretched out on the outdoor sofa listening to the waves was the perfect place to unwind and wait out the jet lag.

Once my head hit the pillow I was straight out, the bed a comfy hug to massage my flight aches and pains and electric blackout blinds helped me to have the deepest and longest sleep I've had in a while...

Breakfast was included and taken in Street 32, an airy bar and restaurant space looking out on Kuta strip and the beach beyond, the perfect place to slowly wake up. Edgard was very patient and helpful considering out jet lagged state!

The kids had a substantial stack of pancakes each with maple syrup and fruit, while I had the Pitaya bowl (try the coconut yogurt bowl too), a wonderfully vibrant purple dragon fruit smoothie bowl and Grassy Drake juice, (dragon fruit, spinach and ginger) to kick off the metabolism...everything was back in balance.

After breakfast I was directed to the front desk and greeted by Gita who had arranged an impromptu kite making lesson for the kids with Nyoman who kindly spent time with us to fly them on the beach after the crafting session. They were also treated to a vesper ride on Mamka's very own vesper and side car by Kevin winding in and out of Kuta's main and side streets. A truly wonderful experience and memory to take away for the kids.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Mamaka and would recommend everyone to stay here. We'll definitely be back!
title: The Only place to stay in Kuta

text:
Stayed 9 nights and really enjoyed the vibe about the place. 

The music at the pool can be too loud and actually drives you away to the beach which is a far more peaceful (I don’t mind music around the pool, but please do turn the volume down) 

The food is excellent including breakfast, lunch and dinner. 

The staff are extremely welcoming and very approachable, except the guy at the surf shop who has a bit of an attitude, so much so that we went to book some lessons and ended up making an excuse and walking away. 

The rooms are compact but very functional, the only issue was the bed, it was very firm and despite having requested a topper, it was still hard and I awoke several times in the night with backache and had to get out of bed and stretch before any chance of getting back to sleep. 

All in all a decent hotel.
title: Great feel about the place

text:
When we first arrived, the room that we were allotted had a musty and damp smell. When we informed the staff, they immediately let us change the room. 

Room and the bathroom were clean, but quite small. The bathroom door doesn’t close completely and it is a bit transparent. There were blackout curtains in the room. The view from our room was the rooms from the hotel  next door. 

Rooftop space is a great place to hang out. Great views, but food there was a let down. Breakfast is on the first floor facing the road. There is a small menu from which we can choose one item for breakfast, and it will be accompanied with coffee and juice. 

All communication with their staff is through their app, which is very convenient. 

There is no robe or slippers in the room. 

Location is great. Beach is just opposite the hotel. Just a 10 second walk. There is a mall, about 8 mins walk from the hotel. Very conveniently located to reach any place in Kuta, Seminyak and Legian by taxi.
title: Clean hotel, but small rooms. Great location.

text:
Our Holiday commenced when greeted at the airport by Godick and his infectious smile, and safe driving, arriving at the Hotel was an extremely smooth process and we were in our room before we knew it. We stayed in a Summer Garden Terrace room for 14 nights, which more than met our requirements. The room was extremely comfortable and the bed and pillows could not be faulted. The house made Ginger beer is delicious. You where always met with a warm smile and a happy face by all staff where ever you went around the Hotel. The couples Massage was greatly enjoyed. The coffee and breakfast were an idea start to the day. The roof top bar and pool was utilised everyday, when ever we stepped off the lift there was a warm smile to greet you, a shout out to the staff Harry and Riska who looked after all of our requests with a smile. There was always a sun bed or Cabana available. It was great to just walk out the front door and be on the beach. 

Looking forward to returning in the New Year.

text:
An amazing location right opposite the beach, you wake up in the morning open the curtains and of course, the surf is perfect. You pile downstairs to grab a board and then get some funny and expert advice from the in house surf coaches that puts even the most malcoordinated specimen on their feet, making you feel like Kelly Slater.

 Breakfast is a scrumptious choice between Melbourne avocado heavy classics and Indonesian carb-goreng favourites, and at all points within this hotel the team working here are completely charming. 

  Upstairs, you’ve got massive rooms, with everything that you could need including peppy jokes on the shower gel, mix your own cocktail sets, really comfy beds and luxurious bathtubs.

Then crowning it all one of the best rooftop pools there is, with a great bar, cracking 80s soundtrack that stays on the cool side of pure dad-music and the same absolutely impeccable service from the amazing staff.   The cocktails are punchy and delicious, and from never being hungrier before dinner, I’ve never been fuller after the seafood platter and garlic bread side, both of which were incidentally mind blowing.   

As they say in the 80s; “Mamamka, you can be my hotel anytime”.
title: Simply put, a fantastically cool hotel that rises above all the competition in Kuta.

text:
Stayed here for 6 days with a group of friends & we are all in the hotels / tourism / hospitality industry so always know what to expect.
Rooms were very clean, comfortable & well appointed. Housekeeping were very attentive & booking your room service via the in house app was very convenient & efficient.
24 hour room service so great, especially given arrival from Australia is in the middle of the night/early morning
Hotel car service highly valued & convenient. Well priced too.

Roof top bar, pool & restaurant offers fantastic views. Spent a lot of time by the pool. The cabanas & beds were perfect!
Sadly food & beverage service in all areas was a bit slow but if you are not super hungry or in a rush, is totally ok. Clear they were not used to near full capacity in terms of service flow or speed but all staff very friendly & accommodating . 
Great location & would certainly go back. Highly recommended.

text:
We stayed here for four nights, and it’s a very good, clean hotel, but there are lots of things that could be a lot better. 

The pool area is really nice, and the staff constantly provide new clean towels. The rooms are very clean and spacious, I also had a really good night sleep whilst staying here. The staff are also really friendly and say hello, and welcome all the time. 
The laundry facility is also really good for us and we are travelling around. The location is also amazing as you’re on the beach, and so you can easily get away from the hustle and bustle, and enjoy great views and peaceful vibes. 

The bar is good, but the menu is slightly limited with food and cocktails. Moreover, the food really does lack flavour - for breakfast and lunch. When I read reviews about this before, I thought, what an earth does that mean? But I think the food is just quite basic, although very good when you compare to a lot of places and is relatively cheap. 

I would stay here again! :)
title: Good, but could be a lot better

text:
Staying in the top gun suite which has 2br. Stayed in both, and both has its problem, but the MASTER suit is worse.
Master: Noisy, you can hear the traffic so loud even after midnight. The shower is just badly design that the water would flow down to the vanity area so the whole bathroom would be wet (photo attached). You'd have to shower inside the bathtub even tho there's a separate shower area.

The other br is better, but all the buttons (for light and curtains) are only on one side of the twin beds. Including the button for bathroom light. So the person sleeping on the other bed has to go to the other side of the room/the side of the other bed just to turn on the bathroom or the bedroom light. And you'd have to walk into the room in the dark bc the button is not next to the door. It's the same for the master br.

Breakfast is not buffet style and choices are limited. Mostly just a toast with eggs in different styles. But you get free flow of water and maybe other drinks too during your stay.
title: The top gun suite, aesthetically pleasing, but lack details

text:
This was my sixth visit to Bali and I’m incredibly pleased that my family and I experienced the most wonderful stay at Mamaka (and I would even say one of my best stays of all, comparing this with my stays at other top rated Airbnb villas in Bali, and 5 star hotels in Singapore). Mamaka has truly great service, great decor, great rooms, great rooftop, great food, at such a great deal! 

The moment I arrived, I was charmed by the aesthetics of the lobby, and friendly vibes from the team that greeted me. Our two rooms (one had a double bed and one had two single beds) were beautifully designed, spacious, with a nice side table & sofa, the bed, pillow, comforter was so comfy (I slept really well because of that), shower had good water pressure, aircon was solid, and cleanliness was well maintained each day. We were given as many complimentary bottles of still water. Smart TV had various apps for your selection and channels. 

I’ve been to my fair share of beach clubs in bali, and Mamaka’s rooftop really blew me away! I loved the colour scheme, the furnishing, the overall vibes was awesome. So many cabanas and sun-beds along the infinity pool (pool was long, good to sleep laps). There is an outdoor movie area with bean bags where they screened a movie each night (nice movies, suitable for the whole family, e.g. Raya and the last Dragon) and served fresh popcorn. The rooftop dining area had good music playlist, ample seatings, and sofas for you to enjoy the gorgeous views of the beach and sunset.

My fam and I are foodies at heart, and we had really tasty food from the various menus of Mamaka, breakfast, lunch, dinner, and 24/7 room service. Listing the delicious food & drinks we had: freshly squeezed juices (such as mango, pineapple), matcha latte, hazelnut coffee, Soto Ayam, dragonfruit bowl, vegetarian nasi goreng, chicken wings, chicken curry, crab omelette, smashed avo with poached eggs on sourdough, fried snapper with tamarind sauce, pizza, chicken katsu ramen, vegetarian kway tiao, fish & chips (haha clearly we loved the food so much that we chose to eat at the hotel couple of times).

The team at Mamaka provided amazing hospitality to us, everyone would say hello, and were sweet & attentive. Special shout-out to Dewi and Bema from concierge, Egard who manages the dining places, and Joe who as the GM of the hotel is a Superstar, leads his team well, spreads good vibes to his guests, and personally arranged things during our stay (such as late check out plus a delicious loaf of banana & nuts bread for us to bring back to Singapore). Thank you very much & hope to see you guys soon! 😊

We have already highly recommended Mamaka to our friends and family, so to all those who are reading this review before deciding to book, wait no more, just book it! You’re definitely in for a fantastic stay! 🤩
title: Mamaka has truly great service, great decor, great rooms, great rooftop, great food, at such a great deal!

text:
You arrive at Mamaka and you immediately notice that this not a cliche hotel. You thought you will hear generic hotel lobby music? Nope. Not at Mamaka. You will hear pop hits from different generations. In fact, as you explore Mamaka you will find pop music references are everywhere. I'm not going to spoil all the fun of finding these yourself, but the body soap is called "Ain't no scrub", the shampoo is "Right hair right now", etc. How fun and creative is that? All this attention to small details makes our stay here unforgetable. And I haven't even started talking about the staff...

People who work here are genuinely great people! You will always get a kind smile, friendly words, and thoughtful service. The staff went out of their way to make our stay comfortable, and they even jumped in when they had heard I had a personal problem and quickly found a solution for it.

On top of all this: everything was comfortable and clean. 5 stars for everything.

text:
A good boutique hotel. I've always been interested in Ovolo and glad had a chance to try it. 

Service - great. 
Location - good in Kuta.
Facilities - medium (more details)

The welcome service was good, warm and followed by a very fast check in. Our room was ready and we can check in immediately. 

The room is nice, and well designed with a lot of thoughtful details behind it. The bed is nice and comfy, I do wish they install some sort of work space or desk. As the lounge chair and sofa in the room is not comfy for working long time. Overall room design is nice and lovely. 

I also have to say I love the bath amenities, not only how it smells but also above any traditional hotel bath standards. Some issues with the bathroom, good water pressure but it does wet the entire floor after shower. The door also doesn't come with any lock, and as it is a slider it does tend to slide open on its own so sort of trickey and something they really need to fix. 

Not sure if it's due to covid or it's the way the hotel operate, but after 5 pm the restaurant and bar by the lobby closes. The rooftop bar and pool is also closes. So, there's really nothing to eat in the hotel. I do hope to see the hotel in it's full party mode. 

Oh if you're staying here, download their app, as there is no directory or phone, all done through the apps. Also they have bikes.
title: Good boutique hotel

text:
Mamaka Hotel by Ovolo brings us the "good soul and good time" while spent our 3D2N family vacay in Kuta area.

Perfectly positioned in Kuta Beach front, also perfectly for modern travellers and surfers alike. Mamaka has artsy deco with unique interrior design start from the main lobby until the details of ornaments and the furniture.

The hotel lobby has the shop corner and many spot deco of signature colorful Butterflies even in surfer board around the lounge. Located also near the lobby Street 32 is vibrant cocktail and eatery. The fnb very delish, also include One Pink Goat which served the authentic coffee.

Summer Garden Terrace Queen is our room type. The bedroom really nice and clean also come with excellent vibration and modern urban touch. The bathroom also very clean, the water flow smoothly and it has OMG shampoo, condi, and body soap in shower room and also the hand soap and body lotion in toilet area. Every product is natural and smells calming and relaxing.

Mamaka give us welcoming bundle of cutie coconut tree baloon with snacks on it, plus it include sunscreen and canvas bag as set to us enjoy the sunset by the Kuta beach. The terrace outdoor is perfect spot to chill out afternight comes very lounging.

Mamaka served us free two drinks as companion to enjoy first sunset view on it's rooftop with 360 view of Kuta Beach and surroundings. 

Other unique points are Mamaka has 'welness zone' so we can actively excercise plus they offer the Personal Trainer by request. The other is Laundry Room, very very helpful to take care our sandy outwear after alongday play in Kuta Beach.

The rooftop pool and cabanas in Mamaka is very very has breathtaking view and ambience. The water pool is very clear, clean and refreshing. The pool has front beach view and we can enjoy the sunset view straightly from the pool. 

Mamaka also offer the Quiksilver Surf Academy for you to explore. When we get there, the event of Surf Camp and Comp has held and hosted by the famous surfer Tipi Jabrik.

Five stars for Mamaka! Thank you for the experience and will definately keep coming back for more :D
title: "Good Vibrations of Kuta Beach Front"

text:
This re-branding hotel is absolutely stunning. We stayed at the summer garden terrace, room 135. The room size might not too big but it’s adequate for 2 people. The room has a terrace where you can smoke or simply having afternoon tea. 

They replenished coffee and tea daily, provide a complimentary snack ( upon checked in ), the bathroom amenities is like no other ( The body lotion is to die for ). 

The Hotel located at the prime location, just across the street from the kuta beach and walking distance to the beach walk shopping center. 

And to prevent the spread of the Covid-19, the hotel didn’t provide phone in the room. Instead, they have a cool application that you can easily download to stay in touch with the reception, checking the menu, etc..perfect! 

The hotel also provide a complimentary washing machine and dryer service, in case you run out of the clothes.

Gym is open 24 hours.

Lastly, the pool and rooftop bar area is AMAZING!!! It’s facing to the kuta beach and have enough sun beds as well as the cabanas. 

So if you think to stay around kuta and legian area, this hotel is absolutely perfect option.

-Reevo-

text:
I very much enjoyed my stay earlier this week.

I have to single out the staff as a real plus point for this hotel. I often find (certainly in Bali) that hotel staff whilst smiley and pleasant all seem to have learnt their questions and responses at the same tourism school. It's well meant but not really sincere. Also, anything out of the ordinary or off-script sends them in to a bit of a panic. Then at 5 star plus hotels it becomes a bit too obsequious and much more of highly trained servant approach - just not my style.

Here, at Mamaka, they have really hit the right balance. The staff were really friendly in a genuine way. I had a great chat with one of the bar staff for 30 minutes and it was just liking talking with a new friend rather than a staff member who feels under pressure to give the right answer to every question. 

I met the person who is managing the cocktail menu - she knows her stuff and was very passionate about the bar. I, accidentally, put one young lad on the spot by asking about a coffee product (pink goat coffee!) in front of his boss. He handled it really well. I had a tour of the unfinished rooms and rooftop (the hotel is still conducting a refurb) by a team member and they did a great job as well….day club and rooftop cinema to come.

The room was nicely decorated, they’ve used some decent materials and I like the wallpaper. Its only just gone under a refurb so of course everything looked like new. Two bugbears of mine were, thankfully, missing: there is a master light switch by the bed! No wandering around a room pressing various light switches and unplugging lamps when you want to go to sleep. Power points - lots of them. I stayed in a hotel in Seminyak two weeks before Mamaka and to charge three devices overnight had to unplug the kettle and move a bedside table. Not a problem here.

Food. Breakfast (off menu not a buffet) was decent. I liked the cart of juice combos they send around. Had a green one - tasted good to me. Breakfast was on first floor (if you are from UK) and had a view of the beach. I would be happy to sit there with coffee and a book for a good few hours.

Sunday afternoon there was a (weekly) event in the bar, DJ, a non-Bintang beer and some delicious bao buns that just keep coming ‘free-flowing buns’. I was able to sit looking out onto the road, watching the world go by. The location is not that far from Beachwalk mall, if that’s your thing. 

The bar/restaurant area has some interesting decoration including some old records, stereo equipment, VHS tapes and DVDs etc. I spent a good five minutes checking out the records on the shelves…very nostalgic! 

One of the best hotel gyms I have used. Good equipment, spacious, punch bag and TRX. I was pleasantly surprised.

I have zero complaints and will definitely be back, especially when the hotel is finished to try out the rooftop facilities.

Couple of points for the management team. These are minor niggles. 

- An issue with the app-based food ordering. Was resolved by the staff easily enough (good staff there, no panicked faces!).
- Social media for WiFi access. Had to get reception to look at this as initially it wanted Facebook or Instagram to log in. I have neither. All I want is a password and no advertising.
- Some of the food. I loved the Bao Buns (see above) but when ordering a room service burger…I just want a burger. I think you should add a normal one or two to the list. Chicken one had kimchee in it - just became a slimy mess. Trying a bit too hard maybe?

Overall, I definitely recommend this hotel. My compliments to the staff especially.
title: Great stay in a newly refurbished hotel

text:
Мы с подругой прожили в этом отеле 10 дней и остались очень довольны.
Новые, с современным ремонтом номера. Всегда есть горячая вода, кондиционер работает отлично. В номере было все необходимое для комфортного проживания, чай, кофе и воду приносили каждый день, без ограничения. Каждый день меняли полотенца, что очень важно для меня. Такого вежливого и приветливого персонала я, честно говоря, мало где встречала. Они всегда с улыбкой выполняли любые просьбы и пожелания. Так как я отдыхала с подругой, мы попросила второе одеяло, оно было в номере через 5 минут. 
Наверху отличный бассейн с видом на океан и ресторан. Всегда были свободные лежаки, хотя отель был достаточно заполнен. 
Очень удобное приложение для связи с персоналом, очень быстро приходил ответ на все мои сообщения, будь то о замене полотенец, о дополнительной уборке номера или по каким-то другим вопросам. Также за дополнительную плату можно приобрести завтраки, что очень удобно, чтобы не тратить время на поездку куда-то.

Хочу сказать отдельное спасибо, что совершенно бесплатно разрешили остаться в номере до 6 вечера, потому что мой вылет был поздно, таким образом я смогла весь день провести на бассейне, вернуться в номер, собраться, собрать вещи и спокойно поехать в аэропорт.
title: Замечательный отель, мы остались очень довольны!

text:
Das Hotel ist an einer ausgezeichneten Lage direkt am Ozean. Es ist neu mit wunderschönen Zimmern. Wir hatten ein modernes Zimmer mit einem Garten umgeben von viel Grün und Palmen. Das Bett ist sehr bequem, das Badezimmer genug gross mit einer grossen Dusche. Es sind alle Hygieneartikel wie Duschseife, Schampo, Zahnbürste etc. vorhanden. 
Das Morgenessen ist von 7:00-11:00 Uhr und man kan ca. 10 Gerichte inkl Kaffee nach Wahl und Fruchtsäften wählen. Das Essen schmeckt ausgezeichnet und sehr vielfältig. Da ist für jeden was dabei, auch für Vegetarier oder Vegane. Im Restaurant kann man zu jeder Zeit etwas zu Essen bestellen. Die Gerichte sind einfach nur top! Auf dem Dach befindet sich ein Wunderschöner Pool mit einer Bar und einem Restaurant mit einem europäischem Koch. Es hat super bequeme Liegestühle und Lugebetten. Der Ausblick ist atmberaubend. Zudem ist ein Fitnesscenter, ein Spabereich etc. vorhanden. Die Preise sind für europäische Verhältnisse sehr tief, aber etwas höher als draussen auf der Strasse was auch logisch ist. Zudem kann man auch kostenlos die Wäsche waschen und trocknen. Unsere Abfahrt war um 19:00 Uhr und an der Rezeption waren sie so freundlich und haben uns den Checkout bis um 16:00 Uhr kostenlos verlängt, einfach nur ausgezeichnet. Hier gibt es nichts zu bemängeln.
title: Wonderfull Hotel in Kuta

Fris en vrolijk ingericht hotel aan het strand. Focus op duurzaamheid bijv. door glazen flessen te gebruiken die ze voor jou steeds aanvullen op de kamer. Kamer was netjes en schoon. Goodybag met lekkere dingetjes is een leuke binnenkomer maar voor mij mag dat weggelaten worden ivm extra plastic:) 

Je kan er sporten en dat is ook schoon en je hebt genoeg attributen. Ook zijn er wasmachines om eventueel je eigen wasje te draaien.

Genoeg keuze voor het ontbijt en lekkere cappuccino’s. Je moet wel tegen een beetje tegen muziek die wat hard staat kunnen op de vroege ochtend;) Ook staat het volume van de rooftop bar wat hard maar in de avond na 24.00 heb je daar geen last van en overdag ben je toch meestal op pad. 

Via een medewerker bij de balie hebben een leuke Vespa kunnen huren via SAAY scooter rent.
